column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////So our bread selection was definitely great bang for your buck
column2: but all the other pastries were overpriced
column3: in my opinion. The macarons didn't look that great and cost more than they do at Tout Suite or Dolce Delights. Also the brunch options were pretty pricey
column4: and the dishes we saw other people eating didn't look impressive enough to surpass other pricey brunch places. But to be fair
column5: I didn't actually eat the macarons or the brunch
column6: so that's just an outside opinion - but just saying
column7: if I'm going to splurge on brunch
column8: I'd rather go to a restaurant known for its high quality dishes
